title: Sampler, 1747
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: two sided cross, half cross, and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Birds, Pascal lamb, St. Hulbert's stag, Adam and Eve, the Annunciation, the Crucifixion, alphabets and sets of numerals.

tombstone.epitaph:
